document_title: Mastitis: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content: Mastitis that is not adequately treated or is due to a blocked milk duct can cause a collection of pus (abscess) to develop in your mammary gland. Abscesses often require surgical drainage. To avoid this complication, talk to your doctor as soon as you develop signs or symptoms of mastitis. [6]
subsection_title: viem tuyen vu.json. Harmful complications can include mastitis

viem tuyen vu.json. Harmful complications can include mastitis
Mastitis that is not adequately treated or is due to a blocked milk duct can cause a collection of pus (abscess) to develop in your mammary gland. Abscesses often require surgical drainage. To avoid this complication, talk to your doctor as soon as you develop signs or symptoms of mastitis. [6]
